messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/4/03 11:04:27 PM, starsuncloud@... writes:

<< > >Also, Odds Bodkin is a
> >nother great story teller,

Oh Yeah!! That's who we have in the car right now...we were listening to him
today in fact. We love storytellers. :) >>

If we end up doing one in New Mexico, I can probably get Ramona King. She
charges a fair amount, but she's also a homeschooling mom and she likes me.

Her daughter, Tam, won a national storytelling competition (for kids) this
spring! Very cool. (Tamarind King, in case you ever hear her name.
Homeschoolers, used to live in Houston, moved here nearly two years ago.)

Sandra
